subject: Human Growth Hormone
Baseball
Perjury
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A jury was seated for Roger Clemens’s perjury trial and the government gave its opening statement, claiming that Clemens lied to Congress and sacrificed relationships to protect his legacy.
snippet: A jury was seated for Roger Clemens’s perjury trial and the government gave its opening statement, claiming that Clemens lied to Congress and sacrificed relationships to protect his legacy.
